attributes.action: Cats owners allow cats outside  only in outside  runner for cats. No free range.
attributes.additional_details: In a summer  my conservatory door open because  heat. I have finches living  in cages. Cats going  inside  when no one at home. Stressing birds and sometimes  its end up that after work im finding out birds without  head or leg ina cage. I have big flowers  beds in garden. When im oredring plug plants. I cannot  planted it out straight away on bedding because  cats constantly  going  on it for toilet . I have to grow plug plants in pots to be big enough  that cats not destroy  it when digging  flower bed. Cats owners have to take responsibility for they animals  and keep them inside.
attributes.background: I cant get any birds is my garden. Includes  chicken ducks finches. Because  cats constantly trying to kill it. And killed in a past.
